SELECT MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI.MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI_ID, MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI.CODE, MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI.NAME, MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI.MS_DM_BUNRUI_ID, MS_DM_BUNRUI.NAME as MS_DM_BUNRUI_NAME, MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI.RENEW_DATE, MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI.RENEW_USER_ID, MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI.USER_KEY, MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI.SEND_FLAG, MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI.VESSEL_ID, MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI.TS
FROM MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI INNER JOIN MS_DM_BUNRUI ON MS_DM_BUNRUI.MS_DM_BUNRUI_ID = MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI.MS_DM_BUNRUI_ID
WHERE (MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI.DELETE_FLAG = 0 or MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI.DELETE_FLAG is NULL)
Order By MS_DM_BUNRUI.CODE, MS_DM_BUNRUI.NAME, MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI.CODE, MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI.NAME

INSERT INTO MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI ( MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI_ID , CODE , NAME , MS_DM_BUNRUI_ID , DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI_ID , :CODE , :NAME , :MS_DM_BUNRUI_ID , :DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI SET CODE = :CODE , NAME = :NAME , MS_DM_BUNRUI_ID = :MS_DM_BUNRUI_ID , DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI_ID = :MS_DM_SHOUBUNRUI_ID
